name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Terrence W. CLARKE, Petitioner

judges: Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 29th day of September, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
